tasks.label: Start Server Node
tasks.description: Start the Vector server node in the terminal.
tasks.command: cd /app && tmux new -s server bash ops/entry.sh || tmux a -t server

tasks.label: Start Router Node
tasks.description: Start the Vector router node in the terminal.
tasks.command: cd /router && tmux new -s router bash ops/entry.sh || tmux a -t router

tasks.label: Server Node Settings
tasks.description: Edit Server Node config with vim.
tasks.command: tmux new -s vimservernode vim /app/config.json || tmux a -t vimservernode

tasks.label: Router Node Settings
tasks.description: Edit Router Node config with vim.
tasks.command: tmux new -s vimrouternode vim /router/config.json || tmux a -t vimrouternode
